name: 15-Minute Cranberry Sauce
preparation: Combine cranberries, water, mix, maple syrup, orange juice, and zest in a Rectangular Steamer.
Cover; microwave on high, for 4â€“5 min.
Mash with Ground Meat Separator; let cool slightly, before serving.
tips: This sauce only has 2 g (1⁄4 tsp) of sugar per 1 tbsp! Most store-bought cranberry sauce can contain up to a whopping 11 g (almost 3 tsp) of sugar per tbsp.

products.name: Rectangular Steamer
summary: Easy to clean. Easy to serve. Rectangular, silicone steamer is perfect for side dishes & desserts.

products.name: Ground Meat Separator
summary: Break up ground meat much easier & faster with this purpose-built tool.
